label: Bilateral
short_description: Both limbs perform the movement simultaneously. Home base for most exercises.

label: Unilateral
short_description: One side works while the other rests. Creates massive "anti-rotation" demand on the obliques and deep core to keep the torso square.

label: Alternating
short_description: Limbs alternate repetitions. Doubles the overall duration of the set, increasing isometric time under tension and requiring dynamic, side-to-side core stabilization.
